question: A man bought an old typewriter for Rs.1200 and spent Rs. 200 on its repair. He sold it for Rs. 1680. His profit percent is :
explanation:
Total cost of typewriter = Rs. (1200+200) = Rs.1400.
S.P= Rs.1680
Profit = Rs.(1680-1400) = Rs.280
Hence profit % = $latex \\frac{280}{1400}\\times 100= 20$%
So option [A] is correct.
